QuestData.Title: Return to Revilgaz
QuestData.Description: Something is happening outside. Could the Bloodsail already be here?$b$bYou'd better get Revilgaz his doublerum. Quickly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Doublerum to Baron Revilgaz at Booty Bay.
QuestData.CompletionText: Guess who showed up while you were gone?
QuestData.RewardText: <The Baron quickly empties his cup.>$b$bAH! Much better, $n. Now, let's get down to business. I believe that you and I have a town to save.
